1183730.name: Akash: Path of the Five Demo
1183730.description:
When the fate of your people rests in the balance, will you follow your destiny or your heart?

Akash: Path of the Five is a groundbreaking, fully voiced visual novel in the otome style.
Players will become Aurora, a member of a magical race of elementals. As the first elemental girl the village has seen in over 200 years, all eyes are on her fast-approaching coming of age ceremony. All is not as it seems, however, as tensions between Akash and a nearby human settlement threaten to erupt into an all-out war. Cultivate a romance with one of her five classmates, navigate the coming conflict, and plan the greatest coming of age ceremony Akash has seen in over two centuries.

Our demo takes place at the very beginning of the game, and provides a full introduction to the world and characters of Akash, a sampling of CGs, and multiple narrative paths through Aurora's story. Full game functionality, including saves, are enabled for this demo, and will carry over to the game proper.
1183730.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
